    • Uses of Viewport in ray.rage.rendersystem

      Methods in ray.rage.rendersystem that return Viewport 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Viewport RenderWindow.createViewport(float bottom, float left, float width, float height)
      Creates a new viewport for this based on the specified dimensions.
      Viewport RenderWindow.getViewport(int index)
      Gets the viewport at the specified index, if it exists.
      Methods in ray.rage.rendersystem that return types with arguments of type Viewport 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<Viewport> RenderWindow.getViewports()
      Allows clients to iterate over all the viewports that have been added to this.
      Methods in ray.rage.rendersystem with parameters of type Viewport 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RenderSystem.clearViewport(Viewport vp)
      Clears a section of the back buffer as defined by the dimensions of the specified viewport.
      void Viewport.Listener.onViewportCameraChanged(Viewport vp)
      A different camera has been assigned to the viewport.
      void Viewport.Listener.onViewportDimensionsChanged(Viewport vp)
      Different relative dimensions have been set for the viewport.
      void RenderWindow.removeViewport(Viewport vp)
      The viewport to be removed.
